displayName: CIS - 2.2.11 - debian9 - Ensure IMAP and POP3 server is not enabled
longDescription: Description: exim is an open source IMAP and POP3 server for Linux based systems.  Rationale: Unless POP3 and/or IMAP servers are to be provided by this system, it is recommended that the package be removed to reduce the potential attack surface.
